title: Calories in Tater Tots
meta_description: Discover calories in tater tots for a standard 85g serving (10 pieces), plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard frozen tater tots (e.g., Ore-Ida style), oven-baked per package, about 8.5g per piece, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, cooking method (baked vs. fried), and added ingredients. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: An 85g serving of oven-baked tater tots contains about 160 calories, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 10 tater tots?
What are the carbs in tater tots?
faqs.a: 21g carbs per 85g serving, with 2g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: Are tater tots high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 340mg sodium per 85g servingâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Calories in fried vs. baked tater tots?
faqs.a: Fried adds about 50-60 calories per serving due to absorbed oil.

faqs.q: How much protein in tater tots?
faqs.a: Only 2g protein per 85g serving, as they're potato-based.
